name: Verify all sections are returned when get all sections endpoint is call
description: As a user I want to get all the projects from TODOIST API

steps.name: When I call to sections endpoint using "GET" method  and without body
Then I receive the response and validate using "get_all_sections" json
And I validate the status code is 200

fullName: Sections: Verify all sections are returned when get all sections endpoint is call
